Results.Title: Apprentice Digital Designer in Engineering
Results.ShortDescription: An exciting opportunity to join an established architectural company, working on architectural metalwork projects for a range of buildings and new developments across the UK. As an Apprentice, you will initially attend the Cadcoe Academy for a 20 week course 4 days a week, where you will learn how to use CAD software for 2D and 3D modelling.

Results.Title: Housing Property Apprenticeship (Front of office / customer services)
Results.ShortDescription: The role of the apprentice property assistant is to support the lettings team, working directly with the senior lettings negotiator reporting to the Lettings manager. Alternate Saturday work is required. A driving license is preferable, but not essential to the role.

Results.Title: Civil Engineering Apprenticeship - Bridges Team
Results.ShortDescription: As a Civil Engineering apprentice, you will be assisting the team of engineers in the delivery of projects from bridges to supporting structures. Your first few years will be spent learning how to use BIM modelling software which could involve working directly with some of our clients.

Results.Title: Building Services Engineering Degree Apprenticeship
Results.ShortDescription:
There’s no such thing as a typical day at WSP. Your role will be varied and your learning will be fast paced. One day can be completely different to the next. 
You may be involved with taking concepts, ideas and designs from an architect or engineer and creating drawings using software such as Autocad to match those given.
Results.TrainingTitle: Building services engineering > Building Services Design Engineer

Results.Title: Rail Design Apprenticeship
Results.ShortDescription: Rail Apprentices support senior colleagues in their design tasks and help with the successful delivery of major rail engineering design schemes. They receive on-the-job engineering design experience giving them the foundations to develop their career within a consultancy.

Results.Title: Property Maintenance Operative Apprentice
Results.ShortDescription:
Are you looking for an opportunity to gain multiple skills and experience in a variety of trade occupations?

BJCC are looking for an Apprentice Maintenance Operative to join our team based in Stirchley. If you would like to support a well established organisation with maintenance and facilities management, please apply!

Results.Title: Painting And Decorating Apprentice
Results.ShortDescription: Do you want to pursue a career in Painting and Decorating with a top quality organisation with an outstanding reputation for their quality of workmanship and customer satisfaction?
